articles.title: Ferrari boss responds to Mattia Binotto reportedly joining Alpine - Formula1News.co.uk
articles.description: Frederic Vasseur replaced Mattia Binotto as Ferrari's team principal following the end of the 2022 season.
articles.content:
Ferrari team principal Frederic Vasseur refused to comment on whether Mattia Binotto is joining Alpine as team principal, following the sacking of Otmar Szafnauer.
